overview: Rafael (Tio Lape) and Joel live in Santiago, Tuxtla, a town in the state of Veracruz, MÃ©xico that has been affected by the war on drugs. They have found a way to remain alive, through their music: Son Jarocho. Building community, thus combating the fear, violence and sadness that entails continuing this way of life.
title: At Least, Here We Are
